singleItemContent: p> Have you ever visited an art gallery?
p> Is there any artwork on the wall in your room?
p> Describe a difficult skill you have learned from an old person.
p> Why the skill was learned from this old person
p> How did you learn it
p> And explain how you felt after you learned the skill
p> What can children learn from their parents? What about their grandparents?
p> From whom can children learn more, parents or grandparents?
p> What kind of help do you think old people need?
